img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(24\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/82/Five_Skandhas_%2824%29.png)
As you emerge in the wide open space, a Giant Shigandang will appear.
img_below_text:
Unfortunately, you will need to be on foot during the fight, so head for its fists and attack the blue crystals on it.
![Five Skandhas \(22\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Five_Skandhas_%2822%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic encounter in a dark, rocky environment, where a player-controlled character, likely the protagonist, faces off against a massive, stone-like creature known as the Giant Shigandang. The creature appears to emerge from the landscape, emphasizing its colossal size and intimidating presence. This scene sets the stage for an intense boss battle, as referenced in the preceding and following text, which provides tactical advice for targeting the creature's blue crystal weak points.
